item.description: We are checking out the "Monkey Rock Writer's Circle" and the Open Mic at the All Asia. I read an article about this night and it looks like a lot of fun! The "Monkey Rock Writer's Circle" starts at 6 pm and the Open Mic starts at 9 pm, hosted by Brian Murphy of The Shills. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Call me at 857.492.6020 or look around for me with my small tan guitar case.

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Open Mic!
